akn:section.akn:heading: Office of the Chief of Space Operations: general duties

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Office of the Chief of Space Operations shall furnish professional assistance to the Secretary, the Under Secretary, and the Assistant Secretaries of the Air Force and to the Chief of Space Operations.
